title: Surrender
description: Mike has always been in love with his co-worker Joanna but is certain his sexual history will turn her off. He’s determined to forget his days of pleasure at the Plume and be “normal”. But when he realizes that Joanna plans to surrender to the Dungeon to pursue her fantasy of captivity, he begs his old pal Rex to let him protect her within the Plume. Rex surrenders Mike to his partner, Athena, to make her fantasy come true, believing that Joanna’s surrender will ensure his own. It seems that everyone will achieve their fantasy except Mike, but passions don’t always run as anticipated within the Plume…
author: Ella Ardent
